00041     class Broker : public ReferenceCount {
00042     public:

00047                           bool overwrite, uint32_t bufsz,
00048                           uint16_t replication, uint64_t blksz) = 0;

00051                         uint32_t amount) = 0;

00053                           uint32_t amount, const void *data, bool flush) = 0;

00058                          uint32_t amount) = 0;

00060       virtual void rmdir(ResponseCallback *, const char *dname) = 0;
00061       virtual void readdir(ResponseCallbackReaddir *, const char *dname) = 0;

00063       virtual void status(ResponseCallback *) = 0;

00067                           const char *dst) = 0;
00068 
00069       OpenFileMap &get_open_file_map() { return m_open_file_map; }
